attributes.action: Reduce or Discount Fuel for all Domiciliary Care Workers.
attributes.additional_details: Carers are unable to afford the fuel to work in domiciliary care due rising costs. It is resulting in staff leaving and In turn making the care sector struggle even more. Carers are using at least 1/4 of their wages each month to use on Fuel.. to work.
attributes.background: Reduce or Discount Fuel for all Domiciliary Care Workers.

rejection.details: The Government isn't directly responsible for the cost of fuel, but you may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618038
